title: Make your digital invitations
subtitle: Easy, elegant, and with real-time guest confirmations

why.title: Why use our service?
why.cardText1: Avoid printing and mailing. With our digital invitations, everything is faster and more economical.
why.cardText2: Choose your favorite template and add music to reflect the essence of your wedding.
why.cardText3: Your guests can confirm attendance, you'll receive an email notification, and you'll have a dashboard with all the information in real time.
why.cardText4: Add the wedding date, location maps, and all key information for your guests.

invitation.title: Digital invitations
invitation.subtitle: Designs optimized for easy sharing from your phone
invitation.cardText1: Traditional elegance with classic details and serif typography.
invitation.cardText2: Floral design with cool tones and elegant typography.

howItWorks.title: How does it work?
howItWorks.cardText1: Create your account and start your digital invitation project.
howItWorks.cardText2: Choose the template, colors, and add your wedding information.
howItWorks.cardText3: Send the invitation to your guests via email, WhatsApp, or social media.
howItWorks.cardText4: Check confirmations and keep everything under control from your dashboard.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.question1: Can I upload my own music for the invitation?
faq.answer1: Yes, you can add your wedding's special song or any music you like to set the mood for your invitation.
faq.question2: Do my guests need to download anything?
faq.answer2: No. They will simply receive a link to the digital invitation and can confirm their attendance by filling out a short form.
faq.question3: Can I edit the invitation after sharing it?
faq.answer3: Absolutely! Any changes you make will be automatically updated for your guests.
faq.question4: Is there a limit to how many people I can invite?
faq.answer4: No, you can send the invitation to as many people as you need.
